title: Create e-commerce platform for skincare products

requirements.text: Create a product catalog that displays skincare items with product name, description, price, and product image

quotes: I want to platform for my store to sale onlin skins Care items

acceptanceCriteria: Products are displayed in a grid or list layout
Each product shows name, description, price, and image
Product data is stored and retrieved from the backend

requirements.text: Implement a shopping cart system where users can add skincare products, view cart contents, update quantities, and remove items

quotes: I want to platform for my store to sale onlin skins Care items

acceptanceCriteria: Users can add products to cart from the product catalog
Cart displays all added items with quantities and subtotals
Users can increase or decrease item quantities
Users can remove items from the cart
Cart shows total price for all items

requirements.text: Create a checkout flow that allows users to complete their purchase with order confirmation

quotes: I want to platform for my store to sale onlin skins Care items

acceptanceCriteria: Users can proceed from cart to checkout
Checkout captures necessary order information
Orders are stored in the backend
Users receive confirmation after completing purchase

requirements.text: Implement product categories or filtering to help users browse skincare items by type (e.g., cleansers, moisturizers, serums, masks)
acceptanceCriteria: Products are categorized by skincare type
Users can filter or navigate products by category
Category information is stored with each product

requirements.text: Design a clean, elegant storefront interface with a cohesive visual theme that reflects skincare and wellness aesthetics, using soft, natural color palettes (such as sage green, cream, and terracotta tones), modern typography, and spacious layouts that emphasize product imagery and readability
acceptanceCriteria: The interface uses a consistent color scheme appropriate for skincare products
Typography is clean and readable
Layout provides good visual hierarchy and whitespace
Product images are prominently displayed
Overall aesthetic feels premium and wellness-focused

requirements.text: Display generated product images and hero banner as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are loaded from the public assets directory
Images are properly displayed in the product catalog and hero section
Image paths reference the generated filenames

constraints: Use single-actor architecture for all Motoko backend logic
Do not modify immutable frontend paths including useInternetIdentity.ts, useInternetIdentity.tsx, useActor.ts, main.tsx, and frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Payment processing integration with external services

required: Hero banner showing natural skincare products with soft lighting and botanical elements (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
Facial cleanser product photo with minimalist aesthetic (cleanser-product.dim_400x400.png)
Moisturizer cream jar on clean background (moisturizer-product.dim_400x400.png)
Vitamin C serum bottle with elegant styling (serum-product.dim_400x400.png)
Face mask product with spa-like presentation (mask-product.dim_400x400.png)
